page.title: 05Tourism: Poldark Amusements
page.content: At the surface of Poldark Mine there is an amusement arcade. The biggest attraction I think is the ball pond, which is a pit full of small plastic balls and has got slides and ropes and music blaring everywhere. There are games like Space Invaders and there is a bouncy castle and an elephant which you go inside and bounce on. There is a sort of climbing frame which has got three or four slides and a fireman's pole. There is also a track for these small motorbikes which you ride on - and a helter skelter.
